description: A variation on a classic. Smokey flavour with a rich and textured sauce.
name: 'Beef' Stroganoff & Mushroom & Butternut Squash Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Fry the cubed butternut squash and plant based meat strips on a non stick pan with the garlic and butter for 3 minutes each side on a medium heat.
Add the shallots and mushrooms the the pan for 6 minutes while tossing. Add the wine, herbs and spices to the pan and fry for a further 2 minutes.
Add the vegetable stock and and vegan cream and continue to cook for 3 minutes while stirring to reduce the sauce.
Cook the pasta in a seperate pot as per pack instructions and then drain fully. Add the cooked pasta to the pan and add the steak strips also and cook for 3 minutes before serving.
